participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Margaret is wise and graceful, enjoying the finer things in life like wine and dancing, which reflect her vibrant spirit despite her age.
participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: John is laid-back and enjoys the simplicity of life, finding joy in sports and creative activities.
participant_2.background: i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i enjoy coloring books.
